sentences.en: A contraflow system is in operation on this section of the motorway.
sentences.cn: 这段高速公路的一侧正在实行双向行驶。

sentences.en: a diagram representing a cross section of the human eye
sentences.cn: 表现人眼的剖面图

sentences.en: A gust of wind pried loose a section of sheet-metal roofing.
sentences.cn: 一阵狂风把铺在屋顶上的一块金属片掀起来了。

sentences.en: An entire poor section of town was bombed into oblivion.
sentences.cn: 城市的一整片贫民区被炸为了平地。

sentences.en: Each section is explained pictorially.
sentences.cn: 每一部分都用图片讲解。

sentences.en: For some buildings a vertical section is more informative than a plan.
sentences.cn: 有些建筑的立面图能比平面图提供更多的信息。

sentences.en: I was surprised at the cross-section of people there.
sentences.cn: 那里的一些典型人物让我感到惊讶。

sentences.en: I'll just flick through the pages until I find the right section.
sentences.cn: 我会快速地翻页，直到找到要找的那一部分。

sentences.en: It holds vegetables in place while they are being peeled or sectioned.
sentences.cn: 它在蔬菜被去皮或切分时将他们固定。

sentences.en: Join one section of pipe to the next.
sentences.cn: 将一段管子与相邻的管子连接起来。

sentences.en: Saboteurs blew up a small section of the track.
sentences.cn: 有人蓄意炸毁了一小段路。

sentences.en: The baby was born by Caesarean section.
sentences.cn: 那婴儿是施行剖宫产手术出生的。

sentences.en: The cross-country section of the three-day event was held here yesterday.
sentences.cn: 3日比赛中的越野项目昨天在这里举行。

sentences.en: The guards were removing a section of fencing to let it through.
sentences.cn: 警卫在拆除一段围栏好让它通过。

sentences.en: The hall is square in cross-section.
sentences.cn: 大厅的横截面是正方形的。

sentences.en: The plane’s tail section was found in a cornfield.
sentences.cn: 飞机的尾部在玉米田里找到了。

sentences.en: the rearmost section of the aircraft
sentences.cn: 飞机的最后部

sentences.en: the smoking section (= where you can smoke )
sentences.cn: 吸烟区

sentences.en: These issues will be discussed more fully in the next section.
sentences.cn: 这些问题将在下一节中有更充分的讨论。

sentences.en: to examine a section from the kidney
sentences.cn: 观察肾脏切片

words.tran_cn: 部门；扇形，扇区；象限仪；函数尺

phrases.tran_cn: 控制部分；控制段；控制节
水平截面；水平切面；水平断面；水平剖面
雷达截面，雷达目标有效截面
n. 特殊型钢，异型钢材

trans.tran_cn: 部分，部件，章节，阶层，部门，地区，平方英里，断面图，切开，切片
trans.tran_en: one of the parts that something such as an object or place is divided into

trans.tran_cn: 切开，做切片，把…切成片，强制入院治疗
trans.tran_en: If something is sectioned, it is divided into sections
